name: Make your own Charter
content: What times/days does the team commit to meetings and working?

name: Meeting Times
content: What are some things that all members want to agree on that will help in your team work?
example:
Example: Monday afternoon, 1 pm - 2 pm 
Weekdays 8 pm - 10 pm
Saturday evening, 8 pm - 10 pm(if necessary)

name: Goals
example:
Suggestions for establishing team goals:
- Identify what the team wants to achieve.
- Make the goals measurable.
- Distinguish between team goals and individual goals./n- Establish deadlines and stick to them.

name: Communication
content: Effective team communication enables teams to achieve goals more effectively.
example:
Suggestions for establishing communication:
- Determine primary method of communicating between team members.
- Establish commitment to communication frequency(daily, weekly, etc)
